thread.title: PRONAUTAS supplies Transas ECDIS to Hermann Lohmann’s fleet
thread.title_full: PRONAUTAS supplies Transas ECDIS to Hermann Lohmann’s fleet

author: porttechnology.org
title: PRONAUTAS supplies Transas ECDIS to Hermann Lohmann’s fleet
text:
PRONAUTAS B.V. GmbH, a leading Transas dealer for the German market, has been selected by the Hermann Lohmann Bereederungen GmbH & Co. KG to equip company’s fleet with ECDIS systems. The agreement includes supply of Dual Transas Navi-Sailor 4000 in the Standard Plus configuration for 19 vessels. PRONAUTAS has already successfully completed installations on 10+ vessels under this project.
Сompany’s CEO, Hermann Lohmann and Fleet Manager Jörg Wellbrock commented that the decision to select PRONAUTAS as an ECDIS supplier was based on trust, efficiency, reliability and best service. 
PRONAUTAS provided prompt implementation of ECDIS solution along with effective and global on-time deliveries, installations and system commissioning for the Lohmann’s fleet.
Lohmann’s crews will benefit from the world-renowned Transas Navi-Sailor 4000 ECDIS Standard Plus System, which brings many additional features, such as AIS, ARPA and Target Management, Tides & Currents, Playback, Maps (User Charts) and Navtex Interface to assist Officers of the Watch (OOW) in efficient route planning and monitoring.
PRONAUTAS is recognised as a total solutions provider for comprehensive navigation, communication and connectivity services for the shipping industry, and has been one of the Transas key dealers since the company’s start.
For more information on Transas, click here
